name: Taoreta Mura
description:
Solo Developed for Ludum Dare 50.

My goal was to learn how to make a good looking game.

Fight for your life... or try to run.

Controls are MOUSE ONLY. Character follows your cursor. Click to dash. Kills reset your dash.

Push for a highscore on the online leaderboards. Goodluck Havefun! Ganbatte!

The Windows download runs better.
